page.title: 10School Games
page.content: get a rounder .If a man hits the post with the ball you are out . On Friday we go swimming we go on the bus to Thirsk baths the infants and juniors go together. When we get there we get changed and than we are divided into three groups and the little infants go in the first group and the better ones go in the next group and then the very good ones go in the in the top group and when we have swam for half an hour we go back to school on the bus again. Other games we play are :_ Tennis, Leafrog, Shinty, BMX, Table tennis, Toes in, Kiss,Cuddle and Torture, Darts, Volley ball, Donkey, Wounded, Conkers, Chains, Marble, Hide and Seek, Block 123, Hopscotch, Skipping, Roller Skating, Laggy, Snooker.
